15.title: Yuya or Yusaku

151.content:
Yuya....was bored. Middle of Sunday, homework all done, and yet...no motivation. So Yuya was shoeless on the bed, legs propped up against the wall, Deck splayed out on the table, bored out of his mind. "Man...this sucks." he muttered. After milling about for a bit more, he took his pendant off his neck and wrapped the string around his finger, and swung it back and forth, watching it. He began to feel sleepy. his arm dropped and he snapped out of it, sitting up in a startle. "What was....that?" He uttered, shocked. Had he.........nearly hypnotised himself, by accident?



The feel of motivation came into his body, along with ideas into his mind........he borkeo ut into a devilish grin. "The fun.....starts now..." he chuckled.


(Who should he hypnotise first?)
151.title: Yuya

info.brief_description: now choose how the hero gets his harem
info.description:
I started thinking that maybe no one added to the other one because there was only one way for the YGO heroes to get their harems. so now this seperate interactive will allow you to choose how to do so, in addition to the millennium rod.

Rules
same as my original 'yu-gi-oh! hypno harem'
